titles.title: Federal Open Space Acquisition and Preservation Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against the estate tax for certain transfers of real property for conservation purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/6/1997--Introduced. Federal Open Space Acquisition and Preservation Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a credit against estate taxes for certain transfers of real property to Federal agencies for conservation purposes. Disallows a deduction under estate tax provisions for a transfer for which such credit has been taken.
